career.title: Academic and Professional Background
career.description: Here is my academic and professional background, from my STI2D Baccalaureate to my current apprenticeship at Sopra Steria.

sopra.title: Apprenticeship at Sopra Steria
sopra.description: Development of training management services and registration campaigns for Paris-Saclay University.|Design of a front-end geomatics module (Angular) for the DIRMED road asset management application.

cesi.title: CESI Engineering School
cesi.description: Admitted to CESI engineering school, I continue my training in computer engineering through apprenticeship.

mgps3.title: 3rd Year IT BUT Apprenticeship
mgps3.description: During this 10-month apprenticeship at MGPS (Satellite Managed Handling), the mission was to develop an application redesign. This software is embedded for equipment operating in commercial ports. I carried out the generation of commercial terminal maps, management of equipment movements, management of forklift driver missions…

mgps2.title: 2nd Year IT BUT Internship
mgps2.description: During this twelve-week internship at MGPS (Satellite Managed Handling), the given mission was to develop, from scratch, an application to mark all events occurring in a handball match and thus benefit from very detailed statistics and an intuitive and easy-to-use application.

iut.title: IT BUT at Aix-Marseille University
iut.description: I followed the application development track: design, development, validation. The IUT of Arles specializes in digital imaging, so I was able to acquire basics in 2D and 3D imaging. The IT BUT allowed me to acquire solid skills in programming, project management and software design, while developing my ability to solve complex problems and work in a team.

bac.title: STI2D Baccalaureate
bac.description: I obtained my STI2D Baccalaureate with a specialization in Information and Digital Systems (SIN) with honors.

restapi.title: REST API
restapi.description: This project aimed to create a REST API in JavaScript with NodeJS and Express. We had freedom regarding the API theme, so I chose to create a very simple database for organizing video game tournaments. In this API, the structure respects the REST architecture. I implemented an authentication token to secure the API, as well as unit tests and documentation.

agenda.title: Calendar
agenda.description: This project aimed to explore development with the React framework by creating a calendar associated with a list of events. Given the project constraints, the use of libraries for creating the calendar was prohibited.

projetannuel.title: Port Mapping PoC
projetannuel.description: This project constitutes the annual work of the third year of the IT BUT. It involves developing a REST API, followed by a web application that communicates with this API. The project is carried out in relation to the company that hosts me in work-study, MGPS. In my case, it is a proof of concept (POC) allowing a user to manage a commercial port map. The user can thus modify container locations, move them, delete them, add them, etc... This allows the company to avoid manually changing container locations at ports.

imageprocessing.title: Image Processing
imageprocessing.description: This project was carried out as part of the mathematical modeling course. The objective was to create a Python notebook to develop Otsu's algorithm, allowing automatic image thresholding. Subsequently, we implemented an image segmentation algorithm using the K-means algorithm.

threejstest.title: ThreeJS Control
threejstest.description: One of the specialties of the IUT Computer Science of Arles is digital imaging. I had the opportunity to discover the ThreeJS technology, a JavaScript development library for creating 3D scenes in a web browser. We carried out a 2-hour practical test on this technology, and I then slightly modified the project to make it more presentable.
